div.p: STIGMA, a brand or impreſſion with a hot iron ; a mark of infamy. See Stigmatizing.

Stigma, in botany, the ſummit or top of the ſtyle, accounted by the ſexualiſts the female organ of generation in plants, which receives the fecundating dust of the tops of the ſtamina, and tranſmits its vapour or effluvia through the ſtyle into the heart of the ſeed-bud, for the purpoſe of impregnating the feeds.
